Literature.Title: Functional synergy of ?-helical antimicrobial peptides and traditional antibiotics against Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria in vitro and in vivo.
Literature.Reference: Eur J Clin Microbiol Infect Dis. 2015;34:197-204
Literature.Author: Feng Q, Huang Y, Chen M, Li G, Chen Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=1µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=4µM),Streptococcus pneumoniae ATCC 49619(MIC=8µM)
